title: ** sold ** Now available for sale, beautiful T202 Tinkers, Evers, Chance - SGC 5
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: ** sold ** Now available for sale, beautiful T202 Tinkers, Evers, Chance - SGC 5
posts.post_content:
**Card is Sold **

Tried the trade route but couldn’t quite find the right match so am now offering this beautiful T202 Tinkers, Evers, Chance graded SGC 5 with great centering, incredible registration (such great focused images compared to many other versions of the card) and a super clean back.  Borders are exceptionally white… overall, not sure you’ll find a 5 like this available for sale.

In fact, as you can see from VCP sales history, this card doesn’t have a ton of sale volume - and it’s just so cool!  3 HOFers on one card, the legendary double play combo and even displayed in the right order.  I love this card!

But I will be “downgrading” to a lower quality version 😢 to help generate funds for other PC needs.  As I’ve mentioned to many others here, I am 98% collector, 2% seller!  

Finally, yes this is above comps but I have already received offers well above comp and I believe this is just an exceptional card… looks way nicer than the technical grade.

Asking $sold plus 3% for PPG&S unless we’ve done deals together and you’re comfortable with F&F.  I have lots of references.

Thx for looking -

Jeff
